typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ContactId as string,
		PurchaseId as string,
		ProductId as string,
		PurchasedOn as string,
		TotalPrice as double,
		ActivityTypeDisplay as string,
		Subject as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: '/eCommerce_eCommercePurchases',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'model',
	folderPath: 'CustomerInsights_e053ffe7-796e-4bcf-ab0f-923857e6ba77/BKW Dataplattform',
	fileSystem: 'crm-data') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'adhocextract',
	folderPath: ("x/y z"),
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
